tool_description: Optimizes work order scheduling considering technician availability, priority levels, location efficiency, and resource constraints.

work_order_ids.description: List of work order IDs to schedule

optimization_goal.description: Optimization goal: minimize_time, minimize_cost, maximize_satisfaction, balanced

consider_travel_time.description: Whether to factor in travel time between locations

error_messages: Invalid scheduling window: scheduling_window_start must be before scheduling_window_end.
No schedulable work orders: None of the provided work order IDs are eligible for scheduling.
Invalid optimization goal: Use one of [minimize_time, minimize_cost, maximize_satisfaction, balanced].
Scheduling conflict: Unable to resolve conflicts with existing scheduled work.
Insufficient technician availability: No technicians available during the specified window.
usage: Provide work_order_ids and scheduling window boundaries. Optionally specify optimization goal and travel considerations. Returns optimized schedule with assigned technicians and time slots.

scheduled_work_orders.description: Work order IDs in optimized scheduling order

assigned_technicians.description: Technician IDs assigned to each work order

scheduled_start_times.description: Scheduled start times for each work order

scheduled_end_times.description: Scheduled end times for each work order

unscheduled_orders.description: Work orders that could not be scheduled
